column10: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower.
The length of the loan term in months.
The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.
The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.
The date when the loan was funded, converted to Unix time.
Debt-to-income ratio calculated using the borrower’s total monthly debt payments divided by their self-reported monthly income.
The number of open credit lines in the borrower’s credit file.
Number of derogatory public records, such as bankruptcy filings, tax liens, or judgments.
The total amount of credit revolving balances.
Revolving line utilization rate, or the amount of credit the borrower is using relative to all available revolving credit.
The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower’s credit file.
